headline: Caterpillar Inc. to Announce Fourth-Quarter and Full-Year 2024 Financial Results on January 30
summary: IRVING, Texas, Jan. 16, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Caterpillar Inc. will release fourth-quarter and full-year 2024 financial results at 5:30 a.m. CST on Thursday, Jan. 30. The full text of the release will...

headline: CNH Industrial: Near-Term Pessimism Provides Long-Term Opportunity
summary: CNH Industrial is well-managed, with a renewed focus on precision ag technologies and improving margins. Read why I rate CNH stock a Buy now.
